data.message: Eminem you are the best rapper and to make music. and I do not care about the people who do not like your music. it means that they do not understand the message as you come out with through your music🎶🎧💞💋👄😍😘

replies.message: The people who don't like eminem are the middle-aged white fat-ass mother-type haters who also hate on Alice in chains, Grand theft auto, Muscle Cars, Big trucks, and they drive priuses, wear polyester everything, are ugly as all hell, and like to talk shit to someone like me who walks around listening to Eminem on my iPod. Thus, an anti-fun activist.
I'm wearing the t-shirt with that pic right now, lol
